title: Phillies Focus On Future After Losing World Series
description: A team that came out of nowhere to reach the World Series is doing its best to focus on a promising future rather than a disappointing present. “We should definitely be proud.”
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:description: The Houston Astros were given all the runs they would need to win Game 6 when José Alvarado allowed a three-run homer to Yordan Alvarez.
